DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Storage Reuse Template Study Activity Repeat Frequency Ratio ISO21090.RTO.INT,PQ.TIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An administrative activity defined at a global library level that is an action of storing samples. A ratio representing the number of occurrences of an activity within a given time period. EXAMPLE(S): Once per 12 hours; 2 times per day

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Storage Reuse Template Study Activity Repeat Frequency Ratio
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Make or do or perform again.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.:Quotient of quantities of the same kind for different components within the same system.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Biospecimen Storage Reuse Template Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.
The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.
Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Make or do or perform again.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.:Quotient of quantities of the same kind for different components within the same system.

Concepts.definition: Make or do or perform again.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
Quotient of quantities of the same kind for different components within the same system.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Quantity quotient of a numerator of type INT divided by a denominator of type PQ.TIME.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
